list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: clean with water and, typically, soap or detergent.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I stripped and washed myself all over
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi lột và rửa mình khắp nơi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of flowing water) carry (someone or something) in a particular direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lũ lụt cuốn trôi những cây cầu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: brush with a thin coat of diluted paint or ink.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the walls were washed with shades of umber
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các bức tường được rửa với sắc thái của umber

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: charm won't wash with this crew
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bùa chú sẽ không rửa với phi hành đoàn này

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of washing something or an instance of being washed.
the disturbed water or air behind a moving boat or aircraft or the sound made by this.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giặt của một chiếc thuyền máy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a layer of paint or metal spread thinly on a surface.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the walls were covered with a pale lemon wash
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các bức tường được bao phủ bởi một rửa chanh nhạt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: silt or gravel carried by a stream or river and deposited as sediment.
kitchen slops and other food waste fed to pigs.
malt fermenting in preparation for distillation.
